thread.section_title: Better Life Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Better Life | www.cleanhappens.com
thread.title: Barbara

author: Barbara
title: Barbara
text:
I love the products as I am against the use of chemicals.
I like some of the products better than others, but overall I am
satisfied. I am trying some for the first time so haven't used them enough to make a decision. I have been using the products for a couple of years and have introduced them to many friends & family members. I thank you for making a good cleaning product that is safe for me and our environment!
